titles.title: Access to Contraception Expansion for Veterans Act
Access to Contraception Expansion for Veterans Act
ACE Veterans Act
ACE Veterans Act

To amend chapter 17 of title 38, United States Code, to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to allow a veteran to receive a full year supply of contraceptive pills, transdermal patches, and vaginal rings, and for other purposes.
Access to Contraception Expansion for Veterans Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
